DL Series
(Download-Only)

The Ayler Records Download-Only Series (aylDL) were first started to give many artists a possibility to be heard, which should have been more difficult if we had stayed with the CD format only, and we hope it'll satisfy those who don't mind “building” their own collection of music in the digital format.

For customers who still want a disc, the DL releases are presented as our regular CD releases, with additional liner notes and photos, and we have designed artwork that can be downloaded along with the music.

They're available on our Digital Store at BandCamp
